alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:54AM CDT until June 18 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Grant County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Saline County in central Arkansas... Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 153 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Perryville to 10 miles south of Williams Junction to near Benton to near Sheridan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Pine Bluff... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Sheridan... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Little Rock AFB... White Hall... Haskell... Shannon Hills... England... Mayflower... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; Saline
